flavorText: Don't let him lead the soldiers, but by all means let him lead the way.

foreignData.flavorText: Lass ihn nicht die Soldaten führen, aber auf jeden Fall vorangehen.
foreignData.name: Goblin-Radaubruder
foreignData.text: Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, haben Eile und greifen in jedem Kampf an, falls möglich.

foreignData.flavorText: Que no lidere a los soldados, pero por supuesto deja que lidere el avance.
foreignData.name: Camorrista trasgo
foreignData.text: Las criaturas que controlas tienen la habilidad de prisa y atacan cada combate si pueden.

foreignData.flavorText: Ne le laissez pas prendre la tête des troupes, mais faites en sorte qu'il passe devant.
foreignData.name: Gobelin godailleur
foreignData.text: Les créatures que vous contrôlez ont la célérité et attaquent à chaque combat si possible.

foreignData.flavorText: Non lasciategli guidare i soldati, ma lasciatelo pure andare avanti.
foreignData.name: Goblin Rissoso
foreignData.text: Le creature che controlli hanno rapidità e attaccano in ogni combattimento, se possono farlo.

foreignData.flavorText: あいつに兵士を率いさせるなよ。けど先頭に立ってもらうのはぜんぜんいいぞ。
foreignData.name: はた迷惑なゴブリン
foreignData.text: あなたがコントロールするクリーチャーは速攻を持つとともに可能なら各戦闘で攻撃する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ゴブリン・狂戦士

foreignData.name: 고블린 선동꾼
foreignData.text: 당신이 조종하는 생물들은 신속 능력을 가지며 가능하면 매 전투단계마다 공격한다.

foreignData.flavorText: Não deixe que ele comande os soldados, mas deixe que ele vá na frente.
foreignData.name: Goblin Arruaceiro
foreignData.text: As criaturas que você controla têm ímpeto e atacam a cada combate se estiverem aptas.

foreignData.flavorText: Не позволяйте ему вести за собой солдат, но постарайтесь отправить его вперед прокладывать дорогу.
foreignData.name: Бешеный Гоблин
foreignData.text: Существа под вашим контролем имеют Ускорение и атакуют в каждом бою, если могут.

foreignData.flavorText: 别让他带兵，但务必让他带路。
foreignData.name: 恶煞鬼怪
foreignData.text: 由你操控的生物具有敏捷异能，且每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击。

foreignData.flavorText: 別讓他帶兵，但務必讓他帶路。
foreignData.name: 惡煞鬼怪
foreignData.text: 由你操控的生物具有敏捷異能，且每次戰鬥若能攻擊，則必須攻擊。

name: Hellraiser Goblin
originalText: Creatures you control have haste and attack each combat if able.

rulings.text: Hellraiser Goblin’s ability also affects itself. If it enters the battlefield before combat, it will have to attack that combat if able.

If, during your declare attackers step, a creature you control is tapped or is affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t attack, then it doesn’t attack. If there’s a cost associated with having a creature attack, you aren’t forced to pay that cost, so it doesn’t have to attack in that case either.

text: Creatures you control have haste and attack each combat if able.
